transcript:
Customer: Ji sir, hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Hanji hanji hanji sir, aap bataye.
Executive: Hello. Sir, jaise aapne D freezer ka wo khol liya na category?
Customer: Hanji hanji main open kar liya. D freezer mein ha open kar diya to D 150 aa raha hai.
Hmm.
Customer: D 150 aap add on kar do.
Executive: D 225. Mere pass aa raha hai D070H161 pehle aa raha hai uske baad D1 ha D 150 aa raha hai H165 ye add karna hai. Matlab is keyword se naam add karna hai na? Jaise D freezer hum keyword lenge. D freezer D 150. D 150 H164 ye model number aur specification mein aapne copy paste mar diya aur photos jo hai aapne teen char photo isme lagi hui hai teen char photo leke usme dalni hai aur D freezer ki catalog maine aapko share kari hai add on kar deni hai niche D freezer ki taki score badh jaye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ye karna hai D freezer ka aaj ka aaj ka task mera yahi hai na?
Customer: Hello. D freezer ka ha D freezer ki category aap aaj puri sudhar lo. Purani jo hai wo delete mat karna. Purani as it is rehne dena. Pata chale apan nayi ke chakkar mein purana bhi ched do naya bhi na ho purana bhi ched diya to lafda na pad jaye.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi ye ho jayega pura. Sham tak aap. Bhaiya pura pura add on pura add on kar dijiye isme D 150 ho gaya 225 ho gaya 300 ho gaya. Single door mein only not double door. D 350 ho gaya. Accha sir ek cheez aur batana jaise isme hum supported aapko ek example dete hain theek hai. Ek product hum add kar karke dekhte hain theek hai main ek minute line par rahiye.
Customer: Ha ek kaam karo aap D 150 ka ek product add kar lo. Uska mere ko aap phone kar do main dekh ke ok kar dunga fir uske baad main model number likha raha hu wo waise add kar do bas sabse best hai.
Executive: Like.
Customer: Copy karne ka option kyun nahi aa raha hai? Alert aa raha hai copy.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai. Aap D 150 ka ek baar add on karke mere ko message dal do check kar dunga aur fir waise waise aap kar dena theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai chalega main kar de raha hu theek hai. Aap theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance adding D freezer models.

- Copy option not available while adding product.



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on adding D freezer models.

- Executive suggested adding one product and informing him.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will add a D 150 product and inform executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- d freezer, product, add on, category
